Name: Smoke and Mirrors No.2
Ingredients: 45 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
20 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2010 at Raines Law Rooms in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Smoke and Mirrors No.2 contains 160 calories
